title: Clamp a temperature reading to [-20, 60]
story: A temperature sensor may temporarily report values outside the safe operating range. Clamp the reading so downstream logic never sees out-of-range temperatures.
post: clamped_temp >= -20 and clamped_temp <= 60 and ((sensor_temp < -20 and clamped_temp == -20) or (sensor_temp > 60 and clamped_temp == 60) or (sensor_temp >= -20 and sensor_temp <= 60 and clamped_temp == sensor_temp))
